snippet: The company will receive about $126 million, while the rest will be divided between the Arora family and the United States private equity firm Clayton, Dubilier & Rice.
abstract: The company will receive about $126 million, while the rest will be divided between the Arora family and the United States private equity firm Clayton, Dubilier & Rice.

headline.main: British Discount Retailer B&M Raises $1.81 Billion in I.P.O.
